comments.author: Jill
comments.content: I happened upon your blog because it was attached to "edamame" entry at wikipedia.  What a happy accident as I am going to visit Seattle for the first time in just a week, and I am a vegetarian.  Thanks for the restauraunt suggestions, especially the vietnamnese subs.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Update: my last sandwich from Seattle Deli tasted a bit like fish sauce, so now I'd recommend Saigon Deli more.

comments.author: goody-goody
comments.content: I love these sandwiches! I had a really good one in San Francisco on my last visit at Urban Picnic. http://www.urbanpicnicsf.com/ I think it had tempeh in it.
